sentences.sContent: I could see that something was terribly wrong.
sentences.sCn: 我能看出有很大麻烦了。

sentences.sContent: When I left school at 16, I couldn't read or write.
sentences.sCn: 我16岁离开学校时不会读也不会写。

phrases.pCn: 本来能做成的（却没做成）
没人能做到；那么别人也休想

trans.tranOther: You use could to indicate that someone had the ability to do something. You use could not or couldn't to say that someone was unable to do something.
